titles.title: Patient's Compassion and Visitation Act of 1996
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide hospitals extend fair visitor privileges to non-family members.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/28/1996--Introduced. Patient's Compassion and Visitation Act of 1996 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require hospitals to extend fair visitors privileges to non-family members.
